title: Press Release: Bill Signed: H.R. 6363 | The White House
content: On Thursday, November 16, 2023, the President signed into law: H.R. 6363, the “Further Continuing Appropriations and Other Extensions Act, 2024,” which provides fiscal year 2024 appropriations to Federal agencies through January 19, 2024, for continuing projects and activities funded in four appropriations bills. For the remaining eight appropriations bills, the CR provides funding through February 2, 2024. ###
